issue.title: Make models semi-transparent while being manipulated

content.raw:
Hi @mohamd_ayman. Thanks for getting involved! I suggest the following interaction: The model only becomes semi-transparent once the model is actually moved. That means that the model stays the original color (even if a manipulation mode is selected) only while the model is being manipulated.

Does that answer your question?
